Accessory Merchant Uska:

Maraku Werewolves tamed giant spiders and now scheme something dangerous. We have to strike fear in them and thwart their plans.

Defeat Maraku Werewolf Chieftains, Kasha Spiders, Kasha Blade Spiders and Evil Eye Patrols roaming there. I thing that slaying 30 monsters will be enough. Are you ready to fight?
